TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DrawMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies how the elements of a control are drawn.

span.span: Specifies how the elements of a control are drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此枚举由成员如中， ，和类。This enumeration is used by members such as in the , , and classes. 您可以重写某些控件或某些元素的绘制。You can override the drawing of some controls or certain elements. 此枚举用于指定由操作系统绘制控件是否你自己的代码处理控件的绘制。This enumeration is used to specify if a control is drawn by the operating system or if your own code handles the drawing of the control. > [!NOTE] > 类仅支持正常; 所有者绘图模式将被忽略。The class only supports Normal; owner draw modes are ignored. 有关使用枚举，请参阅`MeasureItem`和`DrawItem`事件，和`ItemHeight`属性。For more information about using the enumeration, see the `MeasureItem` and `DrawItem` events, and the `ItemHeight` property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建所有者描述项。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 该代码使用属性指定绘制的项固定大小和事件以执行到每个项的绘制。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 该示例代码使用的属性和方法类作为参数传递给事件处理程序来绘制项。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 此示例假定控件称为`listBox1`已添加到窗体，由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序处理事件。This example assumes that a control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 该示例还假定已将项添加到包括"Apple"、"橙色"和"Plum"按此顺序的文本。The example also assumes that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. [!code-csharp[ListBox.DrawMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.DrawMode/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.DrawMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.DrawMode/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode Normal = int32(0)

summary.span: All the elements in a control are drawn by the operating system and are of the same size.

span.span: All the elements in a control are drawn by the operating system and are of the same size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode OwnerDrawFixed = int32(1)

summary.span: All the elements in the control are drawn manually and are of the same size.

span.span: All the elements in the control are drawn manually and are of the same size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode OwnerDrawVariable = int32(2)

summary.span: All the elements in the control are drawn manually and can differ in size.

span.span: All the elements in the control are drawn manually and can differ in size.
